00031 PlainDictionary::PlainDictionary() {
00032     this->sizeHash = 0;
00033     initialize();
00034 }

00039 PlainDictionary::PlainDictionary(unsigned int sizeHash) {
00040     this->sizeHash = sizeHash;
00041     initialize();

00053 PlainDictionary::PlainDictionary(string path, unsigned int mapping,
00054         unsigned int separator, unsigned int nsubjects,
00055         unsigned int npredicates, unsigned int nobjects, unsigned int ssubobj) {
00056     this->mapping = mapping;
00057     this->nsubjects = nsubjects;
00058     this->npredicates = npredicates;
00059     this->nobjects = nobjects;
00060     this->ssubobj = ssubobj;
00061 
00062     string input = path;
00063     input.append(".hdt.D");
00064 
00065     char * symbol;
00066     unsigned int region = 1;
00067     HASHREC* subjectInserted;
00068     HASHREC* predicateInserted;
00069     HASHREC* objectInserted;
00070 
00071     unsigned int id = 1;
00072     char * suffix;
00073     MINIHASHREC* prefixRetrieve;
00074 
00075     hashSubject.inithashtable(nsubjects * 2, true);
00076     hashObject.inithashtable(nobjects * 2, true);
00077     hashPredicate.inithashtable(npredicates * 2, true);
00078     prefixes.inithashtable((nsubjects + nobjects - ssubobj + npredicates / 10)
00079             + 1); //ten per cent of subjects(1 minimum)
00080 
00081     SpacelessParser *SP = new SpacelessParser;
00082 
00083     int voc1 = 0, voc2 = 0, voc3 = 0, voc4 = 0;
00084 
00086     char * prefix = (char *) malloc(1 + MAX_ITEM_PARSED); //as big as the max long in SP
00087 
00088     if (SP->InitParser((char*) input.c_str(), separator)) {
00089         // *** Inicio del proceso de compresi√≥n ***
00090         while (SP->ParseWord()) {
00091             symbol = SP->aWord;
00092 
00093             if (*symbol != '\0') { //exists element
00094 
00095                 if (region == 1) { //shared SO
00096                     //search for prefix
00097                     suffix = strrchr(symbol, '/'); //get substring suffix
00098 
00099                     if (suffix != NULL) {
00100 
00101                         strncpy(prefix, symbol, suffix - symbol + 1);
00102                         prefix[suffix - symbol + 1] = '\0';
00103 
00104                         prefixRetrieve = prefixes.hashinsert(prefix); //search or insert prefix
00105 
00106                         subjectInserted = hashSubject.hashinsert(symbol, id,
00107                                 prefixRetrieve);
00108                     } else {
00109                         //insert with no prefix
00110                         subjectInserted = hashSubject.hashinsert(symbol, id,
00111                                 NULL);
00112                     }
00113 
00114                     subjectInserted->shared = true;
00115                     //insert with the same Id (autoincrement on insert)
00116                     id--;
00117                     objectInserted = hashObject.hashinsert(subjectInserted, id);
00118 
00119                     //insert auxiliary
00120                     subjects_shared.push_back(subjectInserted);
00121 
00122                     voc1++;
00123                 } else if (region == 2) { //not shared Subjects
00124                     suffix = strrchr(symbol, '/'); //get substring suffix
00125 
00126                     if (suffix != NULL) {
00127                         strncpy(prefix, symbol, suffix - symbol + 1);
00128                         prefix[suffix - symbol + 1] = '\0';
00129                         prefixRetrieve = prefixes.hashinsert(prefix); //search or insert prefix
00130                         subjectInserted = hashSubject.hashinsert(symbol, id,
00131                                 prefixRetrieve);
00132                     } else {
00133                         //insert with no prefix
00134                         subjectInserted = hashSubject.hashinsert(symbol, id,
00135                                 NULL);
00136                     }
00137 
00138                     //insert auxiliary
00139                     subjects_not_shared.push_back(subjectInserted);
00140 
00141                     voc2++;
00142                 } else if (region == 3) { //not shared Objects
00143                     suffix = strrchr(symbol, '/'); //get substring suffix
00144 
00145                     if (suffix != NULL) {
00146                         strncpy(prefix, symbol, suffix - symbol + 1);
00147                         prefix[suffix - symbol + 1] = '\0';
00148                         prefixRetrieve = prefixes.hashinsert(prefix); //search or insert prefix
00149                         objectInserted = hashObject.hashinsert(symbol, id,
00150                                 prefixRetrieve);
00151                     } else {
00152                         //insert with no prefix
00153                         objectInserted
00154                                 = hashObject.hashinsert(symbol, id, NULL);
00155                     }
00156 
00157                     //insert auxiliary
00158                     objects_not_shared.push_back(objectInserted);
00159 
00160                     voc3++;
00161                 } else if (region == 4) { //predicates
00162                     suffix = strrchr(symbol, '/'); //get substring suffix
00163 
00164                     if (suffix != NULL) {
00165                         strncpy(prefix, symbol, suffix - symbol + 1);
00166                         prefix[suffix - symbol + 1] = '\0';
00167                         prefixRetrieve = prefixes.hashinsert(prefix); //search or insert prefix
00168                         predicateInserted = hashPredicate.hashinsert(symbol,
00169                                 id, prefixRetrieve);
00170                     } else {
00171                         //insert with no prefix
00172                         predicateInserted = hashPredicate.hashinsert(symbol,
00173                                 id, NULL);
00174                     }
00175 
00176                     //insert auxiliary
00177                     predicates.push_back(predicateInserted);
00178 
00179                     voc4++;
00180                 }
00181 
00182             } else {
00183                 region++; //change region
00184                 if (region == 3) { //objects not shared
00186                     if (mapping == MAPPING2) {
00187                         id = ssubobj + 1; //restart id
00188 
00189                         //cout << "MAPPING2 = " << id << endl;
00190                     } else {
00191                         id = nsubjects + 1; //restart id
00192 
00193                         //cout << "MAPPING1 = " << id << endl;
00194                     }
00195                 } else if (region == 4) { //predicates
00196                     id = 1; //restart id
00197                 }
00198             }
00199         }
00200     } else {
00201         cout << " !! Not a valid Dictionary:" << endl;
00202         //return false;
00203     }
00204     free(prefix);
00205 
00206     //cout << "LEO: " << voc1 << ";" << voc2 << ";" << voc3 << ";" << voc4 << endl;
00207 
00208     //return true;
00209 }
00210 
00214 void PlainDictionary::initialize() {
00215     if (sizeHash > 0) {
00216         hashSubject.inithashtable(sizeHash, false);
00217         hashObject.inithashtable(sizeHash, false);
00218         //predicate Hash is initialized to 1 per 1000 of subjects and objects
00219         hashPredicate.inithashtable(sizeHash / 1000, false);
00220 
00221         //prefixes is initialized to 10 per cent of size  
00222         prefixes.inithashtable(sizeHash / 10);
00223     } else {
00224         hashSubject.inithashtable(false);
00225         hashObject.inithashtable(false);
00226         hashPredicate.inithashtable(INITIAL_SIZE / 1000, false);
00227 
00228         //prefixes is initialized to 10 per cent of size
00229         prefixes.inithashtable(INITIAL_SIZE / 10);
00230     }
00231 }
00232 
00236 void PlainDictionary::split() {
00237     HASHREC* subjectRetrieve;
00238     HASHREC* predicateRetrieve;
00239     HASHREC* objectRetrieve;
00240 
00241     unsigned int i = 0;
00242 
00243     //split shared subjects-objects from subjects
00244     for (i = 0; i < hashSubject.TSIZE; i++) {
00245         subjectRetrieve = hashSubject.get(i);
00246         if (subjectRetrieve != NULL) {
00247             if (subjectRetrieve->shared == true) {
00248                 subjects_shared.push_back(subjectRetrieve);
00249             } else
00250                 subjects_not_shared.push_back(subjectRetrieve);
00251             //verify next
00252             while (subjectRetrieve->next != NULL) {
00253                 subjectRetrieve = subjectRetrieve->next;
00254 
00255                 if (subjectRetrieve->shared == true) {
00256                     subjects_shared.push_back(subjectRetrieve);
00257                 } else
00258                     subjects_not_shared.push_back(subjectRetrieve);
00259             }
00260         }
00261     }
00262 
00263     nliterals = 0;
00264 
00265     //split shared subjects-objects from objects    
00266     for (i = 0; i < hashObject.TSIZE; i++) {
00267         objectRetrieve = hashObject.get(i);
00268 
00269         if (objectRetrieve != NULL) {
00270             if (objectRetrieve->word[0] == '"')
00271                 nliterals++;
00272 
00273             if (objectRetrieve->shared == false)
00274                 objects_not_shared.push_back(objectRetrieve);
00275 
00276             //verify next
00277             while (objectRetrieve->next != NULL) {
00278                 objectRetrieve = objectRetrieve->next;
00279                 if (objectRetrieve->word[0] == '"')
00280                     nliterals++;
00281 
00282                 if (objectRetrieve->shared == false)
00283                     objects_not_shared.push_back(objectRetrieve);
00284             }
00285         }
00286     }
00287 
00288     //push predicates
00289     for (i = 0; i < hashPredicate.TSIZE; i++) {
00290         predicateRetrieve = hashPredicate.get(i);
00291         if (predicateRetrieve != NULL) {
00292             predicates.push_back(predicateRetrieve);
00293             //verify next
00294             while (predicateRetrieve->next != NULL) {
00295                 predicateRetrieve = predicateRetrieve->next;
00296                 predicates.push_back(predicateRetrieve);
00297             }
00298         }
00299     }
00300 
00301     nsubjects = subjects_not_shared.size() + subjects_shared.size();
00302     npredicates = predicates.size();
00303     nobjects = objects_not_shared.size() + subjects_shared.size();
00304     ssubobj = subjects_shared.size();
00305 
00306     cout << "\n\t [Dictionary stats:\n";
00307     cout << "\t   shared subjects-objects:" << ssubobj << "\n";
00308     cout << "\t   not shared subjects:" << nsubjects - ssubobj << "\n";
00309     cout << "\t   not shared objects:" << nobjects - ssubobj << "\n";
00310     cout << "\t total subjects:" << nsubjects << "\n";
00311     cout << "\t total objects:" << nobjects << "\n";
00312     cout << "\t total predicates:" << npredicates << " ]\n\n";
00313 }
00314 
00319 void PlainDictionary::lexicographicSort(unsigned int mapping) {
00320     this->mapping = mapping;
00321 
00322     //sort shared and not shared subjects
00323     sort(subjects_shared.begin(), subjects_shared.end(),
00324             PlainDictionary::cmpLexicographic);
00325     sort(subjects_not_shared.begin(), subjects_not_shared.end(),
00326             PlainDictionary::cmpLexicographic);
00327 
00328     //sort not shared objects
00329     sort(objects_not_shared.begin(), objects_not_shared.end(),
00330             PlainDictionary::cmpLexicographic);
00331 
00332     //sort predicates
00333     sort(predicates.begin(), predicates.end(),
00334             PlainDictionary::cmpLexicographic);
00335 
00336     map(this->mapping);
00337 }
00338 
00343 void PlainDictionary::map(unsigned int mapping) {
00344     unsigned int i, j, k;
00345 
00346     //iterate over subjects shared and update their id and the id of objects_shared (directly in the hash)
00347     for (i = 0; i < subjects_shared.size(); i++) {
00348         subjects_shared[i]->id = i + 1;
00349         hashObject.hashsearch(subjects_shared[i])->id = i + 1;
00350     }
00351 
00352     for (j = 0; j < subjects_not_shared.size(); j++) {
00353         subjects_not_shared[j]->id = i + j + 1;
00354     }
00355 
00356     switch (mapping) {
00357     case MAPPING1:
00358         // SINGLE mapping
00359         for (k = 0; k < objects_not_shared.size(); k++) {
00360             objects_not_shared[k]->id = i + j + k + 1;
00361         }
00362         break;
00363     case MAPPING2:
00364         // SHARED mapping
00365         for (k = 0; k < objects_not_shared.size(); k++) {
00366             objects_not_shared[k]->id = i + k + 1;
00367         }
00368         break;
00369     default:
00370         cout << "   <ERROR> Mapping " << mapping
00371                 << " is not supported in Dictionary" << endl;
00372     }
00373 
00374     for (j = 0; j < predicates.size(); j++) {
00375         predicates[j]->id = j + 1;
00376     }
00377 }
00378 
00383 void PlainDictionary::checkTriple(string *node) {
00384     HASHREC* subjectInserted;
00385     HASHREC* predicateInserted;
00386     HASHREC* objectInserted;
00387     HASHREC* subjectRetrieve;
00388     HASHREC* objectRetrieve;
00389 
00390     unsigned int globalId = 1;
00391     string substring = "";
00392     unsigned int pos_separator = 0;
00393     MINIHASHREC* prefixRetrieve;
00394 
00395     try {
00396         if (node[0] != "") {
00397             //test subject-object
00398             objectRetrieve = hashObject.hashsearch((char*) node[0].c_str());
00399 
00400             if (objectRetrieve != NULL) {
00401                 subjectInserted = hashSubject.hashinsert(objectRetrieve,
00402                         globalId);
00403                 objectRetrieve->shared = true;
00404             } else {
00405                 //not shared
00406                 //search for prefix
00407                 pos_separator = node[0].find_last_of("/");
00408                 if (pos_separator > 0) {
00409                     substring = node[0].substr(0, pos_separator + 1);
00410                     prefixRetrieve = prefixes.hashinsert(
00411                             (char*) substring.c_str()); //search or insert prefix
00412                     subjectInserted = hashSubject.hashinsert(
00413                             (char*) node[0].c_str(), globalId, prefixRetrieve);
00414                 } else {
00415                     //insert with no prefix
00416                     subjectInserted = hashSubject.hashinsert(
00417                             (char*) node[0].c_str(), globalId, NULL);
00418                 }
00419             }
00420 
00421             if (node[1] != "") {
00422                 //search for prefix
00423                 pos_separator = node[1].find_last_of("/");
00424                 if (pos_separator > 0) {
00425                     substring = node[1].substr(0, pos_separator + 1);
00426                     prefixRetrieve = prefixes.hashinsert(
00427                             (char*) substring.c_str()); //search or insert prefix
00428                     predicateInserted = hashPredicate.hashinsert(
00429                             (char*) node[1].c_str(), globalId, prefixRetrieve);
00430                 } else {
00431                     //insert with no prefix
00432                     predicateInserted = hashPredicate.hashinsert(
00433                             (char*) node[1].c_str(), globalId, NULL);
00434                 }
00435 
00436                 if (node[2] != "") {
00437                     //test object-subject
00438                     subjectRetrieve = hashSubject.hashsearch(
00439                             (char*) node[2].c_str());
00440                     if (subjectRetrieve != NULL) {
00441                         objectInserted = hashObject.hashinsert(subjectRetrieve,
00442                                 globalId);
00443                         subjectRetrieve->shared = true;
00444                     } else {
00445                         //search for prefix
00446                         pos_separator = node[2].find_last_of("/");
00447                         if (pos_separator > 0) {
00448                             substring = node[2].substr(0, pos_separator + 1);
00449                             prefixRetrieve = prefixes.hashinsert(
00450                                     (char*) substring.c_str()); //search or insert prefix
00451                             objectInserted = hashObject.hashinsert(
00452                                     (char*) node[2].c_str(), globalId,
00453                                     prefixRetrieve);
00454                         } else {
00455                             //insert with no prefix
00456                             objectInserted = hashObject.hashinsert(
00457                                     (char*) node[2].c_str(), globalId, NULL);
00458                         }
00459 
00460                     }
00461                 }
00462             }
00463         }
00464     } catch (char * s) {
00465         cout << "***" << s << endl;
00466     }
00467 }
00468 
00474 unsigned int PlainDictionary::retrieveID(string key, unsigned int vocabulary) {
00475     unsigned int id = ERROR;
00476     HASHREC * ret = NULL;
00477     switch (vocabulary) {
00478     case VOC_SUBJECT:
00479         ret = hashSubject.hashsearch((char*) key.c_str());
00480         if (ret != NULL)
00481             id = ret->id;
00482         break;
00483     case VOC_PREDICATE:
00484         ret = hashPredicate.hashsearch((char*) key.c_str());
00485         if (ret != NULL)
00486             id = ret->id;
00487         break;
00488     case VOC_OBJECT:
00489         ret = hashObject.hashsearch((char*) key.c_str());
00490         if (ret != NULL)
00491             id = ret->id;
00492         break;
00493     default:
00494         cout << "   <ERROR> Mode " << vocabulary
00495                 << " is not supported in Dictionary" << endl;
00496         id = ERROR;
00497     }
00498 
00499     return id;
00500 }
00501 
00508 void PlainDictionary::updateID(unsigned int id, unsigned int new_id,
00509         unsigned int vocabulary) {
00510     switch (vocabulary) {
00511     case VOC_SUBJECT:
00512         if (id <= subjects_shared.size()) {
00513             subjects_shared[id - 1]->new_id = new_id;
00514             cluster_subjects_shared[new_id - 1] = subjects_shared[id - 1];
00515 
00516             //cout << "SO[" << id << ">" << new_id << "] = " << cluster_subjects_shared[new_id-1]->word << endl;
00517         } else {
00518             subjects_not_shared[id - subjects_shared.size() - 1]->new_id
00519                     = new_id;
00520             cluster_subjects_not_shared[new_id - subjects_shared.size() - 1]
00521                     = subjects_not_shared[id - subjects_shared.size() - 1];
00522 
00523             //cout << "S[" << id << ">" << new_id << "] = " << cluster_subjects_not_shared[new_id-subjects_shared.size()-1]->word << endl;
00524         }
00525 
00526         break;
00527 
00528     case VOC_OBJECT:
00529         if (id <= subjects_shared.size()) {
00530             subjects_shared[id - 1]->new_id = new_id;
00531             cluster_subjects_shared[new_id - 1] = subjects_shared[id - 1];
00532 
00533             //cout << "SO[" << id << ">" << new_id << "] = " << cluster_subjects_shared[new_id-1]->word << endl;
00534         } else {
00535             unsigned int pos;
00536 
00537             if (mapping == MAPPING2)
00538                 pos = subjects_shared.size() + 1;
00539             else
00540                 pos = nsubjects + 1;
00541 
00542             objects_not_shared[id - pos]->new_id = new_id;
00543             cluster_objects_not_shared[new_id - pos] = objects_not_shared[id
00544                     - pos];
00545 
00546             //cout << "O[" << id << ">" << new_id << "] = " << cluster_objects_not_shared[new_id-subjects_shared.size()-1]->word << endl;
00547         }
00548 
00549         break;
00550     default:
00551         cout << "   <ERROR> Mode " << vocabulary
00552                 << " is not supported in Dictionary" << endl;
00553     }
00554 }
00555 
00561 string PlainDictionary::retrieveString(unsigned int id, unsigned int vocabulary) {
00562     switch (vocabulary) {
00563     case VOC_SUBJECT:
00564         if (id <= subjects_shared.size()) {
00565             // Shared subject
00566             if (subjects_shared[id - 1]->prefix == NULL) {
00567                 return subjects_shared[id - 1]->word;
00568             } else {
00569                 string word;
00570                 word.assign(subjects_shared[id - 1]->prefix->word);
00571                 word.append(subjects_shared[id - 1]->word);
00572                 return word.c_str();
00573             }
00574         } else {
00575             if (subjects_not_shared[id - subjects_shared.size() - 1]->prefix
00576                     == NULL) {
00577                 return subjects_not_shared[id - subjects_shared.size() - 1]->word;
00578             } else {
00579                 string word;
00580                 word.assign(
00581                         subjects_not_shared[id - subjects_shared.size() - 1]->prefix->word);
00582                 word.append(
00583                         subjects_not_shared[id - subjects_shared.size() - 1]->word);
00584                 return word.c_str();
00585             }
00586         }
00587 
00588         break;
00589     case VOC_PREDICATE:
00590         if (predicates[id - 1]->prefix == NULL) {
00591             return predicates[id - 1]->word;
00592         } else {
00593             string word;
00594             word.assign(predicates[id - 1]->prefix->word);
00595             word.append(predicates[id - 1]->word);
00596             return word.c_str();
00597         }
00598 
00599         break;
00600     case VOC_OBJECT:
00601         if (id <= subjects_shared.size()) {
00602             // Shared object
00603             if (subjects_shared[id - 1]->prefix == NULL) {
00604                 return subjects_shared[id - 1]->word;
00605             } else {
00606                 string word;
00607                 word.assign(subjects_shared[id - 1]->prefix->word);
00608                 word.append(subjects_shared[id - 1]->word);
00609                 return word.c_str();
00610             }
00611         } else {
00612             unsigned int pos;
00613 
00614             if (mapping == MAPPING2) {
00615                 pos = id - subjects_shared.size() - 1;
00616             } else {
00617                 pos = id - nsubjects - 1;
00618             }
00619 
00620             if (objects_not_shared.size() <= pos) {
00621                 return "";
00622             }
00623 
00624             if (objects_not_shared[pos]->prefix == NULL) {
00625                 return objects_not_shared[pos]->word;
00626             } else {
00627                 string word;
00628                 word.assign(objects_not_shared[pos]->prefix->word);
00629                 word.append(objects_not_shared[pos]->word);
00630                 return word.c_str();
00631             }
00632         }
00633 
00634         break;
00635     default:
00636         cout << "   <ERROR> Mode " << vocabulary
00637                 << " is not supported in Dictionary" << endl;
00638         return NULL;
00639     }
00640 }
00641 
00645 void PlainDictionary::beginClustering() {
00646     cluster_subjects_shared.resize(subjects_shared.size());
00647     cluster_subjects_not_shared.resize(subjects_not_shared.size());
00648     cluster_objects_not_shared.resize(objects_not_shared.size());
00649 }
00650 
00654 void PlainDictionary::endClustering() {
00655     subjects_shared = cluster_subjects_shared;
00656     subjects_not_shared = cluster_subjects_not_shared;
00657     objects_not_shared = cluster_objects_not_shared;
00658 
00659     cluster_subjects_shared.~vector();
00660     cluster_subjects_not_shared.~vector();
00661     cluster_objects_not_shared.~vector();
00662 }
00663 
00669 unsigned int PlainDictionary::isClusterized(unsigned int id,
00670         unsigned int vocabulary) {
00671     switch (vocabulary) {
00672     case VOC_SUBJECT:
00673         if (id <= subjects_shared.size())
00674             id = subjects_shared[id - 1]->new_id;
00675         else
00676             id = subjects_not_shared[id - subjects_shared.size() - 1]->new_id;
00677         break;
00678     case VOC_PREDICATE:
00679         id = predicates[id - 1]->new_id;
00680         break;
00681     case VOC_OBJECT:
00682         if (id <= subjects_shared.size())
00683             id = subjects_shared[id - 1]->new_id;
00684         else {
00685             unsigned int pos;
00686 
00687             if (mapping == MAPPING2)
00688                 pos = id - subjects_shared.size() - 1;
00689             else
00690                 pos = id - nsubjects - 1;
00691 
00692             // OJO AQUI CON EL MAPPING!!!!
00693             id = objects_not_shared[pos]->new_id;
00694         }
00695         break;
00696     default:
00697         cout << "   <ERROR> Mode " << vocabulary
00698                 << " is not supported in Dictionary" << endl;
00699         id = ERROR;
00700     }
00701 
00702     return id;
00703 }
00704 
00710 void PlainDictionary::write(string path, unsigned int marker) {
00711     unsigned int i = 0;
00712 
00713     string output = path;
00714     output.append(".hdt.D");
00715     ofstream outFile(output.c_str());
00716 
00717     //shared subjects-objects from subjects
00718     for (i = 0; i < subjects_shared.size(); i++) {
00719         if (subjects_shared[i]->prefix != NULL) {
00720             outFile << subjects_shared[i]->prefix->word;
00721         }
00722         outFile << subjects_shared[i]->word;
00723         outFile.put(marker); //character to split file
00724     }
00725 
00726     outFile.put(marker); //extra line to set the beggining of next part of dictionary   
00727 
00728     //not shared subjects
00729     for (i = 0; i < subjects_not_shared.size(); i++) {
00730         if (subjects_not_shared[i]->prefix != NULL) {
00731             outFile << subjects_not_shared[i]->prefix->word;
00732         }
00733         outFile << subjects_not_shared[i]->word;
00734         outFile.put(marker); //characte to split file
00735     }
00736 
00737     outFile.put(marker); //extra line to set the beggining of next part of dictionary   
00738 
00739     //not shared objects
00740     for (i = 0; i < objects_not_shared.size(); i++) {
00741         if (objects_not_shared[i]->prefix != NULL) {
00742             outFile << objects_not_shared[i]->prefix->word;
00743         }
00744         outFile << objects_not_shared[i]->word;
00745         outFile.put(marker); //character to split file
00746     }
00747 
00748     outFile.put(marker); //extra line to set the beggining of next part of dictionary   
00749 
00750     //predicates
00751     for (i = 0; i < predicates.size(); i++) {
00752         if (predicates[i]->prefix != NULL) {
00753             outFile << predicates[i]->prefix->word;
00754         }
00755         outFile << predicates[i]->word;
00756         outFile.put(marker); //character  to split file
00757     }
00758 
00759     if (outFile.good())
00760         outFile.close();
00761 }
00762 
00767 void PlainDictionary::dumpStats(string &output) {
00768     unsigned int i = 0;
00769 
00770     const int maxval = 50000;
00771     const int nbins = 50000;
00772 
00773     Histogram histoURI(0, maxval, nbins);
00774     Histogram histoLiteral(0, maxval, nbins);
00775     Histogram histoBlank(0, maxval, nbins);
00776 
00777     string tmp;
00778     //shared subjects-objects from subjects
00779     for (i = 0; i < subjects_shared.size(); i++) {
00780         tmp.clear();
00781 
00782         if (subjects_shared[i]->prefix != NULL) {
00783             tmp.append(subjects_shared[i]->prefix->word);
00784         }
00785         tmp.append(subjects_shared[i]->word);
00786 
00787         if (tmp[0] == '<') {
00788             histoURI.Add(tmp.length());
00789         } else if (tmp[0] == '"') {
00790             histoLiteral.Add(tmp.length());
00791         } else if (tmp[0] == '_') {
00792             histoBlank.Add(tmp.length());
00793         } else {
00794             cout << "String not URI/Lit?: " << tmp << endl;
00795         }
00796     }
00797 
00798     //not shared subjects
00799     for (i = 0; i < subjects_not_shared.size(); i++) {
00800         tmp.clear();
00801         if (subjects_not_shared[i]->prefix != NULL) {
00802             tmp.append(subjects_not_shared[i]->prefix->word);
00803         }
00804         tmp.append(subjects_not_shared[i]->word);
00805 
00806         if (tmp[0] == '<') {
00807             histoURI.Add(tmp.length());
00808         } else if (tmp[0] == '"') {
00809             histoLiteral.Add(tmp.length());
00810         } else if (tmp[0] == '_') {
00811             histoBlank.Add(tmp.length());
00812         } else {
00813             cout << "String not URI/Lit?: " << tmp << endl;
00814         }
00815     }
00816 
00817     //not shared objects
00818     for (i = 0; i < objects_not_shared.size(); i++) {
00819         tmp.clear();
00820         if (objects_not_shared[i]->prefix != NULL) {
00821             tmp.append(objects_not_shared[i]->prefix->word);
00822         }
00823         tmp.append(objects_not_shared[i]->word);
00824         if (tmp[0] == '<') {
00825             histoURI.Add(tmp.length());
00826         } else if (tmp[0] == '"') {
00827             histoLiteral.Add(tmp.length());
00828         } else if (tmp[0] == '_') {
00829             histoBlank.Add(tmp.length());
00830         } else {
00831             cout << "String not URI/Lit?: " << tmp << endl;
00832         }
00833     }
00834 
00835     //predicates
00836     for (i = 0; i < predicates.size(); i++) {
00837         tmp.clear();
00838         if (predicates[i]->prefix != NULL) {
00839             tmp.append(predicates[i]->prefix->word);
00840         }
00841         tmp.append(predicates[i]->word);
00842         if (tmp[0] == '<') {
00843             histoURI.Add(tmp.length());
00844         } else if (tmp[0] == '"') {
00845             histoLiteral.Add(tmp.length());
00846         } else if (tmp[0] == '_') {
00847             histoBlank.Add(tmp.length());
00848         } else {
00849             cout << "String not URI/Lit?: " << tmp << endl;
00850         }
00851     }
00852 
00853     histoURI.end();
00854     histoURI.dump(output.c_str(), "URI");
00855 
00856     histoLiteral.end();
00857     histoLiteral.dump(output.c_str(), "Literal");
00858 
00859     histoBlank.end();
00860     histoBlank.dump(output.c_str(), "Blank");
00861 }
00862 
00864 PlainDictionary::~PlainDictionary() {
00865     hashSubject.~HashTable();
00866     hashObject.~HashTable();
00867     hashPredicate.~HashTable();
00868     prefixes.~MiniHashTable();
00869 }
